[Ohio Senate 2024 | Columbus Metro (Franklin County - Upper Arlington/Dublin) | P7: F, 48, School board member, Worthington, Biden 2020, education focus]
Q: What about Jim Stanton?
"Vouchers would devastate public schools. He's openly hostile to public education."
